subdisciplines.name: Bookbinding
subdisciplines.description: The art and craft of physically assembling a book from an ordered stack of paper sheets that are folded together into sections or sometimes left as a stack of individual sheets.

subdisciplines.name: Letterpress Printing
subdisciplines.description: A printing technique in which the text is literally pressed onto the paper using a printing press, leaving an impression on the paper.

subdisciplines.name: Typographic Design
subdisciplines.description: The art and process of designing typefaces and using them to create visually appealing and readable text.
